name: National STEM Scholars High School Award
description: Merit-based scholarship for outstanding high school STEM students. $5,000 award recognizing academic excellence in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics fields.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Science, Technology
